articles.author: Euan McKirdy, CNN
articles.title: Pakistan Taliban leader linked to Malala attack reportedly killed
articles.description: A US drone strike in Afghanistan's northeastern Kunar province has killed a leading militant, who was the man in charge of the Pakistan Taliban's (TTP) operations in the Swat Valley when activist Malala Yousafzai was shot in 2012, according to a Afghan govern…

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: The Latest: Officials say mines, bombs kill dozens in Yemen
articles.description: The Latest on the battle for Hodeida in Yemen (all times local): 2:45 p.m. Yemeni officials say dozens of coalition-backed fighters have been killed mostly by Shiite rebel Houthi land mines and roadside bombs as fighting outside the airport of Hodeida intensi…

articles.author: https://www.nytimes.com/by/ana-swanson
articles.title: U.S. to Put Tariffs on $50 Billion in Chinese Goods as Trade Fight Widens
articles.description: The step by the Trump administration threatened to shift what had primarily been a war of words between Washington and Beijing into a full-blown trade war.

articles.title: ‘A total disaster’: Trump weighs in on report critical of FBI, highlights a damaging finding
articles.description: Taking to Twitter, the president made his first comments on findings related to the handling of Hillary Clinton’s emaill probe.

articles.author: Andy Eckardt, Alastair Jamieson, Reuters
articles.title: Germany's Merkel faces political crisis over migrant policy
articles.description: German Chancellor Angela Merkel faces a showdown with her own interior minister that threatens her fragile alliance — and her dominance of European politics.

articles.title: Daytona Beach roller coaster that derailed reportedly had a spotty maintenance record
articles.description: Officials say two riders fell from the front car of the Sand Blaster and dropped more than 30 feet to the ground below

articles.title: For Pruitt Aides, the Boss’s Personal Life Was Part of the Job
articles.description: Senior staff members at the E.P.A. said they frequently felt pressured by Scott Pruitt to help in nonwork matters and obtain favors for his family.

articles.description: It would force Michael Avenatti to stop speaking to the press; Avenatti calls request "complete joke"

articles.title: Analysis | Recidivism Watch: Trump administration again blames others for its own family separation policy
articles.description: Trump and his advisers keep saying the law forces them to separate immigrant families at the border. No law requires this.
